text: (atarku musa) â€œniccayamaka atu pumiyil ulavatippatarkum, payirukkut tannir iraippatarkum payanpatuttappatata, atil arave vatuvillata kuraiyarra oru matu'' enru avan kurukiran enrar. (Atarku) avarkal''ippolututan nir cariyana vivaram kontu vantir'' enak kuriya pinnum avarkal arukka manaminriye atai aruttarkal
